messages.message: Moderation question here: Are these flags against the users behaviour or the chat history?

Moderation runs for every particular query (in this case "What is the full address of the applicant?") and does not involve previous queries if that’s what you mean chat history. Every query will have its own moderation flags similar to this.
good to see these kind of features :raised_hands:
I can imagine it’s hard to catch all the edge cases
but good to see it’s able to get the obscure wording for harm
Yup but its been there for as long as I can remember.
Thanks for making me the scapegoat for testing these flags @Orlando :stuck_out_tongue:
Im just keeping an eye on you ….
Are there any release notes or documentation around :point_up:? We had multiple pieces of feedback from Intact using Converse as we wouldn't block such prompts.
We just use the moderation api from openai: https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/moderation/overview
